806320.name: The Seven Districts of Sin: The Tail Makes the Fox - Episode 1 Deluxe Goodies
806320.description:
This DLC contains deluxe content for The Seven Districts of Sin: The Tail Makes the Fox Episode 1.

The downloadable package contains:

  • A 39 Page Artbook, containing high resolution versions of art featured in-game, bonus illustrations, and developer commentary
  • An official guide to the game and its various endings, written by the developer
  • 30 Icons & Avatars from characters in the game
  • 8 High Resolution Wallpapers
